Package business

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
business.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Class that do all related to playing a game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameManager(CharacterManager characterManager, AdventureManager adventureManager)
    Constructor of the GameManager gets the other two managers to load the game and monsters, and get the Party characters and save the experience.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addListener(GameListener listener)
    Method that creates the listener of this game that is the Controller.
    String
    iniciarAventura(ArrayList<Character> party, String aventura)
    Method that starts the adventure and do all the game from start to the end.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager(CharacterManager characterManager, AdventureManager adventureManager)
      Constructor of the GameManager gets the other two managers to load the game and monsters, and get the Party characters and save the experience.
      Parameters:
      characterManager - instance of characterManager to get the characters needed from persistence.
      adventureManager - instance of adventureManager to get the adventure and monsters from persistence.

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      public void addListener(GameListener listener)
      Method that creates the listener of this game that is the Controller.
      Parameters:
      listener - saves the GameListener to talk with the Controller.

    • iniciarAventura

      public String iniciarAventura(ArrayList<Character> party, String aventura)
      Method that starts the adventure and do all the game from start to the end. It only needs a list of the characters that will play the game, and the name of the adventure. At the end will save the experience gained in persistence.
      Parameters:
      party - an ArrayList of all the characters that will play the game.
      aventura - a String that contains the name of the game.
      Returns:
      a String that don't have anything relevant. it can be void, actually.
